page.title: 08OUR SCHOOL IN 1985
page.content: WE GO TO{DRAYCOTT AND RODNEY STOKE {FIRST SCHOOL.}THERE ARE 43 CHILDREN IN OUR {SCHOOL}, THEY ARE DIVIDED INTO TWO CLASSES. CHILDREN COME TO OUR { {SCHOOL}AT THE AGE OF FOUR AND LEAVE AT NINE YEARS OLD TO GO ON TO A MIDDLE SCHOOL IN {CHEDDAR.}MOST OF US THINK OUR SCHOOL IS GOOD. THE THINGS WE LIKE BEST ARE : USING THE {COMPUTER} {COOKING, GYM, SEWING AND WEAVING}ALSO GOING {SWIMMING}ON WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON.THERE ARE TWO TEACHERS AT OUR SCHOOL, AND ANOTHER LADY WHO COMES IN ON TWO MORNINGS A WEEK. WE DON'T HAVE TO PAY TO GO TO SCHOOL LIKE CHILDREN ONE HUNDRED YEARS AGO, BUT WE DO JOIN IN THINGS LIKE {SPONSORED {SWIMS} TO COLLECT MONEY FOR THE SCHOOL.AT BREAKTIMES WE PLAY LOTS OF GAMES SUCH AS { {CRICKET,FOOTBALL,SKIPPING}.
